plays.text: Goal scored by Kirk Maltby assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Chris Chelios

Penalty to Ossi Vaananen 2 minutes for Roughing Boyd Devereaux

Penalty to Boyd Devereaux 2 minutes for Slashing Ossi Vaananen
